timeline.bodyText: I think we should either have a constant for MapStringConverter or just move its methods to this entity. The latter is probably better.
timeline.author: pedroigor

replies.bodyText: I've updated my PR to use the constant. Also I've added TODO to revert this change once quarkus fix is applied and we can update to the quarkus version with the fix. I did not changed the "MapStringConverter" class itself. Is it fine for you that way?
replies.author: mposolda
